Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending the nuisance abatement law regarding alcoholic beverages
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Amending the nuisance abatement law regarding alcoholic beverages.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to resolving conflicts between the nuisance abatement law and related proceedings and fines for public nuisances involving alcohol
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Resolving conflicts between the nuisance abatement law and related proceedings and fines for public nuisances involving alcohol.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring laboratory reports in drug-related nuisance abatement cases
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Requiring laboratory reports in drug-related nuisance abatement cases.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to excluding certain violations involving possession of a controlled substance or marihuana from the nuisance abatement law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Excluding certain violations involving possession of a controlled substance or marihuana from the nuisance abatement law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the application of temporary orders obtained pursuant to the nuisance abatement law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Limiting the application of temporary orders obtained pursuant to the nuisance abatement law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting exclusions of natural persons pursuant to the nuisance abatement law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Prohibiting permanent exclusions pursuant to the nuisance abatement law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the padlock law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Repealing the padlock law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring procedures for the corporation counsel when filing actions under the nuisance abatement law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Requiring procedures for the corporation counsel when filing actions under the nuisance abatement law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a police or peace officer to personally witness a drug violation to file an action under the nuisance abatement law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Requiring a police or peace officer to personally witness a drug violation to file an action under the nuisance abatement law.

Items.MatterName: Nuisance Abatement Fairness Act - Restricting certain orders and dispositions pursuant to the nuisance abatement law.
